# Juan Esquivel

> Lore maximalist. Previously Head of Marketing at StableLab (2023–2026). Building brand, narrative, and lore in crypto. Based in Lisbon, Portugal. Currently exploring what's next.

Juan Esquivel is a crypto marketer specializing in brand strategy, content marketing, and positioning for Web3 companies. He led marketing at StableLab, a DAO governance infrastructure company, through three business phases: services, product launch, and sales-led GTM. Previously, he was Content Lead at Boardroom. He writes about crypto marketing, building brands, storytelling, and working at startups.

## Core Information

- Name: Juan Esquivel
- Location: Lisbon, Portugal
- Role: Marketing leader, currently open to opportunities
- Twitter/X: @0xCadena
- Email: juanesquivel138@gmail.com
- Personal brand: "lore maximalist"

## Expertise

- Crypto/Web3 Marketing
- Brand Strategy & Positioning
- Content Marketing
- B2B Marketing for Technical Products
- Narrative Design & Storytelling
